wikipedia_page.main: Tristan Benjamin (born 1 April 1957) is an English former footballer who played the majority of his career in defence for Notts County.Benjamin joined County as an apprentice and signed professional for them in March 1975. He made 311 league appearances for County, before moving to Chesterfield at the end of the 1987 season.After a season at Chesterfield he moved on again playing semi-professional football for Shepshed Charterhouse, Corby Town and Sutton Town.
